snippet: The president visited Sgt. First Class Cory Remsburg at the Army Ranger’s new house near Phoenix, which was built by veterans’ groups.
lead_paragraph: The president visited Sgt. First Class Cory Remsburg at the Army Ranger’s new house near Phoenix, which was built by veterans’ groups.

headline.main: Obama Reinforces Bond With Wounded Veteran at Arizona Home
